languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's turn, it disappears.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Ассасин{/g} выбирает противника в своей зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} и отмечает на нем дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} с ближайшей к себе стороны. Если до конца своего хода ассасин не нанесет туда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g}, дополнительное слабое место исчезнет.

traits.locale_text: The Assassin chooses an enemy in their line of sight and marks an additional opening on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening isn't hit by the end of the Assassin's turn, it disappears.

The Assassin chooses an enemy in their line of sight and marks an additional opening in this enemy on the side closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening isn't hit by the end of the Assassin's turn, it disappears.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's turn, it disappears.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Ассасин{/g} выбирает противника в своей зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} и отмечает на нем дополнительное {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} с ближайшей к себе стороны. Если до конца своего хода ассасин не нанесет туда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g}, дополнительное слабое место исчезнет.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's turn, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: Ассасин выбирает противника в своей зоне видимости и отмечает на нем дополнительное слабое место с ближайшей к себе стороны. Если до конца своего хода ассасин не нанесет туда удар, дополнительное слабое место исчезнет.

Ассасин выбирает противника в своей зоне видимости и отмечает на нем дополнительное слабое место с ближайшей к себе стороны. Если до конца своего хода ассасин не нанесет туда удар, дополнительное слабое место исчезнет.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的一名敌人，该名敌人最靠近刺客的一侧会被标记额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}。如果刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，这个额外的破绽没有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，该破绽就会消失。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: 刺客选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内的一名敌人，该名敌人最靠近刺客的一侧会被标记额外的破绽。如果刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，这个额外的破绽没有被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}，该破绽就会消失。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} elige a un enemigo situado dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y marca una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}zona desprotegida{/g} adicional en su lado más próximo al asesino. Si esta zona desprotegida adicional no recibe ningún {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino, desaparece.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: El asesino elige a un enemigo situado dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} y marca una zona desprotegida adicional en su lado más próximo al asesino. Si esta zona desprotegida adicional no recibe ningún {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino, desaparece.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und markiert eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} bei diesem Gegner auf der Seite, die dem Assassinen am nächsten ist. Wenn diese zusätzliche Blöße bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Assassinen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, verschwindet sie.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: Der Assassine wählt einen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} und markiert eine zusätzliche Blöße bei diesem Gegner auf der Seite, die dem Assassinen am nächsten ist. Wenn diese zusätzliche Blöße bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Assassinen nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird, verschwindet sie.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} choisit un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} et perce une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} supplémentaire sur celui-ci, sur le flanc le plus proche de lui. Si cette brèche supplémentaire n'a pas été {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin, elle disparaît.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: L'Assassin choisit un ennemi dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} et perce une brèche supplémentaire sur celui-ci, sur le flanc le plus proche de lui. Si cette brèche supplémentaire n'a pas été {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchée{/g} à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin, elle disparaît.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}の敵1体を選び、アサシンから一番近い側に追加の{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}「隙」{/g}をマークする。この追加の「隙」は、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了までに攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}しなかった場合、消滅する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening is not {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.

traits.locale_text: アサシンは{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}の敵1体を選び、アサシンから一番近い側に追加の「隙」をマークする。この追加の「隙」は、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了までに攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}しなかった場合、消滅する。
